GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/comments.description: serves an array of all comments in the database

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: Gives an array of all users in the db

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns the article with matching id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns the updated article when given an object with a key of inc_votes

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an array of comments matching the article_id

exampleResponse.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Add a post object containing a body and a username key: { body: 'This is a test!',username: 'butter_bridge'}. Returns a comments that has just been added on an article matching the article_id with the body and username given.
